Apos.​Input.​ConditionMouse
Apos.​Input.​Condition
public
Apos.​Input.​ConditionMouse

Checks various conditions on a specific mouse button.  Non static methods implicitly make sure that the game is active. Otherwise returns false.

Constructors
ConditionMouse
public ConditionMouse(
Func<MouseState, ButtonState> needButton
)
Parameter
needButton
Func<MouseState, ButtonState>

The button to operate on.

Public Functions
Pressed
public bool Pressed()
Returns

Returns true when a button was not pressed and is now pressed.

Held
public bool Held()
Returns

Returns true when a button is now pressed.

HeldOnly
public bool HeldOnly()
Returns

Returns true when a button was pressed and is now pressed.

Released
public bool Released()
Returns

Returns true when a button was pressed and is now not pressed.

bool IsActive
)
